syllabus:
**課程簡介 (Course Description)**:

現今藝術創作形式多元, 實則難以確加定義或歸類, 基於藝術創作語言之複雜樣式, 本課程擬由創作者以自身所處之環境, 創作習慣與文化背景, 在面對各種形態之創作工具(如數位, 媒體, 影音或跨領域素材), 思考以繪畫為本, 進而探索適合自己運用之藝術創作語彙, 同時審度個人之創作特色(Individual Language)或時代精神(Zeitgeist).

Today, art positions have indeed gone through deep changes due to aspects of society, the technical developments, and the matrix of cultural values. However, performances of 2D depiction appear repeatedly under complicated disguises and with various intentions in different eras. The aim of this course is to demonstrate individual painting language and investigate the critical position of modernist visual representation.
